name: Candy Bomb
description:
Exploring the mysterious fun world of Candy Bomb, simply slide the rows or columns to match groups of 3 or more same candies to blast, use unique props and power-ups for the preparation of difficult levels. Come and enjoy tasty candies in Candy Bomb with us!

Features:
- Fantastic candy wonderland, over 144 well-designed FREE levels are waiting for your challenge
- Colorful and vivid candy graphics
- Stunning music and sound effects
- No time limit
- Play anywhere and anytime
- Updates come out all the time

How to play:
- Swap and match more than 3 identical candies to crush
- Make special candy combos to help you burst various barriers
- Collect the golden key to help with the tough situation
- Be careful about the obstacles: Chocolate, Ice cube, Cream, Cake etc.
- Gather enough candies to win before you run out of moves

Keep having fun whenever you jump into the candy world!
